pr_title: [wemo] Do http (not port) ping to determine if wemo port is alive

timeline.message:
Poll using http not icmp
Signed-off-by: Bill Forsyth <bf@cyrenica.com>

timeline.bodyText: Please remove the commented out code
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyText: So IOException this would never get thrown now right?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Correct. It's caught and used to set the flag to move on to the next port.
replies.author: billfor
